pageList.title: Content principles
pageList.description: Keep these basic ideas in mind to write Export Service content, or any other content.

pageList.title: Content structure
pageList.description: How to organise, separate and format content on a page.

pageList.title: Voice and tone
pageList.description: How to say something in the Export Service and how it should sound to our users.

pageList.title: Content styles
pageList.description: Use our rules on grammar, punctuation and more elements of our preferred styles.

pageList.title: Content patterns
pageList.description: Reusable ways to combine content for common tasks in the Export Service.

scope.title: Content
scope.description: Basic principles to create clear and consistent content in the Export Service. Learn how to express, structure and style content that meets users’ needs.

document.content:
## About our content guidance

You can use this guidance to create content for the Export Service that is:

- consistent
- clear
- comprehensive
- accurate
- accessible.

Our guidance on content will grow as the Export Service expands and changes.

For more help to create content, see [How to create guidance in the Export Service](/guides/how-to-write-guidance).

If you have questions about this guidance or would like to suggest changes, you can contact us at [guidanceandsupport@aff.gov.au](mailto:guidanceandsupport@aff.gov.au).
